author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-KP Inkaso WEC Signs Annex To Factoring Deal
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - KANCELARIA PRAWNA INKASO WEC SA :
* SAID ON SATURDAY THAT IT SIGNED ANNEX TO DEAL WITH COMPANY FROM MINING INDUSTRY
* ANNEX INCREASES FACTORING LIMIT TO 0.375 MILLION ZLOTYS Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
